measure: ban on events with more than 1000 persons
entry ban from high risk countries
event ban for events larger than 100 persons
restaurants, nightclubs and bars cannot host more than 50 persons
the use of eye protective gear is recommended
the use of surgical masks is recommended for all medical and care personel
the use of FFP2/FFP3 masks is recommended for all procedures with risk of areosol formation
the use of surgical masks is not recommended for the population
restrition of incoming cross-border mobility for selected countries
explicit social distancing recommended (stay at home policy)
closure of non-essential stores and private entertainment institutions, skiing resort, swimming pools, and establishments with close contact
ban of gatherings of more than 5 people
